keyword: how many calories in busch light
title: How Many Calories in Busch Light?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in Busch Light per 12 oz serving, plus carbs, protein, full nutrition breakdown, and serving tweaks for better tracking.
h1: How Many Calories in Busch Light?
assumptions: Standard 12 fl oz can or bottle; light lager beer, no additives or mixers.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by batch, serving size, and brand specifics; always check the label for exact values.

quick_answer.text: One 12 oz serving of Busch Light contains 95 kcal and 3.2 g carbs.

label_note: Values align with standard Nutrition Facts for beverages, scaled to the serving size.

faqs.q: How many calories in one Busch Light?
faqs.a: 95 kcal per standard 12 fl oz serving.

faqs.q: What are the carbs in Busch Light?
faqs.a: About 3.2 g of carbohydrates per 12 oz, with 0 g fiber and sugars.

faqs.q: Does Busch Light have protein or fat?
faqs.a: Minimal: 0.8 g protein and 0 g fat per serving.

faqs.q: How does Busch Light compare calorie-wise to other light beers?
faqs.a: It's low at 95 kcal, similar to many light lagers like Bud Light (110 kcal).

faqs.q: Is sodium high in Busch Light?
faqs.a: Low at 10 mg per 12 oz serving.
